name: Michael Griffiths
seeking: Seeks JV partners who can refer businesses and professionals needing consulting, coaching, or strategic optimization support. Would benefit from cross-referral relationships with business educators, executive coaches, or professional associations whose members are actively investing in consulting services for growth.
who_you_serve: Businesses and professionals seeking consulting, coaching, and strategic guidance for growth and optimization.
what_you_do: Michael Griffiths is the #1 authority helping service professionals to fast track their business growth by transforming their referral systems, their client retention strategies and skyrocketing their client loyalty.
social_proof: 2 x #1 International Best Selling Author, Over 500 Presentations Delivered In 20+ Countries & 250+ Podcast Interviews, #1 Referral Marketing Podcast On I-Tunes For 5 Years Straight, 12 Years Entrepreneur - 7 Businesses Grown & 6 Sold In Multiple Industries
business_focus: Helping service professionals fast track their business growth through transforming their referral systems, client retention strategies and client loyalty.
